name: Precious
headline: AI to curate your baby photos
description:
Precious is the iPhone app that tells the story of your children growing up.

Using Artificial Intelligence, the app automatically finds the best baby pics on your phone, and then creates deliciously cute photo stories for you.

Our vision is to help all families capture the joy of childhood. To do this, we are building the platform for preserving, enjoying & sharing your family's memories.
markdown:
raw_markdown='[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca68c330adf05ae69e991bc/5ca68c330adf054ce4e991da_Precious%20Icon.jpg)Precious](https://preciousapp.com/<https:/start.preciousapp.com>)
![](https://trkn.us/pixel/conv/ppt=4195;g=conversion;gid=18201;ord=4102)
# The easiest way to turn your baby photos into cherished moments. 
Precious automatically organizes your best baby photos into timelapse videos, monthly albums, and more. 
[Go to App Store](https://preciousapp.com/<https:/itunes.apple.com/us/app/precious-baby-photo-art/id1103530261>)
Easy, Fast & Super Adorable
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca68c330adf05ae69e991bc/5ca68c330adf05720ce991df_5%20star.svg)
Feb 28
Msjjthompson
With two small children, it's not always easy to edit photos and throw in cute little extra stickers. This app makes it quick and simple; each picture I've done hasn't taken more than a minute, and I'm very pleased with the results. Even my husband is impressed!
Love this app!!!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca68c330adf05ae69e991bc/5ca68c330adf05720ce991df_5%20star.svg)
Aug 14
sjtroop
I can honestly say that this app is everything it promises to be. I am very picky when it comes to ease of use and being time efficient and this app does everything for you. Super easy to use and has the best frames for your photos! It also makes videos of your special moments. I just love it all!!!!
Brings Joy to My Day
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca68c330adf05ae69e991bc/5ca68c330adf05720ce991df_5%20star.svg)
Jul 2
IzzyBear18
If there was another name for the app Precious it would be Joy! I have a 7 week old baby (my first) and it’s so important to me to capture, share and save all the memories and milestones especially during the first year. Every day I look forward to the new frames and artwork for the photos I took from the day before!
Precious is great!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca68c330adf05ae69e991bc/5ca68c330adf05720ce991df_5%20star.svg)
Jul 22
Lexinicole1213
Precious is such a fun and creative way to enjoy and remember the wonderful moments of your baby! It's also so helpful for mommy's who are busy because it creates picture art for you, so you don't have to think about it. Precious makes things easier by taking pictures and enhancing and embellishing them so you can just pick what you like and post them, it's super easy!
Best of both worlds
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca68c330adf05ae69e991bc/5ca68c330adf05720ce991df_5%20star.svg)
Jul 30
JillyJilllll
I am definitely enjoying the app. I really love the fact that the app creates photos, videos, animations, etc., for you but also gives you the opportunity to freestyle and use your own creativity. Another cool feature is the daily artwork, it's a cute surprise to look forward to.
Love it
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca68c330adf05ae69e991bc/5ca68c330adf05720ce991df_5%20star.svg)
Sept 2
ElliotsMuva
As a busy new mom I’m able to capture photos on the go & they even prepare photos and videos for me, so I don’t miss any moment and get to enjoy motherhood!
##  Adorable Photo Art
Celebrate your baby’s monthly milestones, first haircut, and more. Explore hundreds of stickers to help you highlight and preserve their best moments. 
## Time Lapse Video
Your baby grows up fast! Photos alone don’t show that progress. Our time lapse videos do. 
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca68c330adf05ae69e991bc/5ca68c330adf054e4ee991ef_Time-Lapse-Video-thumb.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca68c330adf05ae69e991bc/5ca68c330adf05ebcbe991f0_play-button.svg)Play Video](https://preciousapp.com/<#>)
## Automatic Albums
Keep filling your camera roll with photos of your baby. Precious automatically organizes your photos into albums. 
## Photo Calendar 
The months can fly by. Cherish that time with our photo calendar. Every time you take a photo, we organize those photos by month and year for you. 
[Adorable Photo Art](https://preciousapp.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Time Lapse Video](https://preciousapp.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Automatic Albums](https://preciousapp.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Photo Calendar](https://preciousapp.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
## You don’t always have time to edit and organize your baby photos. 
With Precious, get gorgeous photos like this, without lifting a finger. Every day, Precious works behind the scenes to turn your iPhone photos into fun, lovable keepsakes. 
With Precious
Without Precious
## Open Precious each morning to see what new artwork we’ve created for you.
Share these photos with friends and family. Save them to your album. Every photo inside Precious is yours to keep—forever. 
[Go to App Store](https://preciousapp.com/<https:/itunes.apple.com/us/app/precious-baby-photo-art/id1103530261>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca68c330adf05ae69e991bc/5ca68c330adf05720ce991df_5%20star.svg)
“Amazing app for all those little memories”
saf_kam
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca68c330adf05ae69e991bc/5ca68c330adf05720ce991df_5%20star.svg)
“Helps to keep a track and account of your baby’s growth. Really like the calendar feature”
Shantiora
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca68c330adf05ae69e991bc/5ca68c330adf05720ce991df_5%20star.svg)
"I love this app wish I knew about it sooner"
**beauty 92**
© 2022 Curious Creators Co.
[Privacy Policy](https://preciousapp.com/</privacy-policy>)
|
[Terms](https://preciousapp.com/</terms-conditions>)

generated_description:
### The Precious Company Overview

**Company Name:** Precious  
**Founded:** Part of Y Combinator Batch W18  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Size:** Team of 7 Employees  
**Website:** [preciousapp.com](https://preciousapp.com/)  

#### Mission

Precious is on a heartfelt mission: to harness the power of artificial intelligence to curate and celebrate baby photos. The core aim is to help families capture the fleeting joy of childhood through beautifully crafted stories.

#### What They Do

The Precious app is designed to effortlessly curate and organize your baby pictures. It automatically identifies the best images on your device and transforms them into engaging formats—think timelapse videos, monthly albums, and plenty of adorable photo art. For busy parents, this means capturing precious moments without the hassle of manual editing.

The app’s functionalities include:
- **Adorable Photo Art:** Enhance your memories with fun stickers and frames to highlight milestones.
- **Time Lapse Videos:** Show how fast your baby grows by creating time-lapse videos from your photos.
- **Automatic Albums:** Never lose track of your memories; the app organizes your photos by month and year.
- **Photo Calendar:** Visually track your baby’s progress through monthly snapshots.

You can easily share these memorable keepsakes with friends and family, making every photo yours to treasure forever.

#### User Experience

The feedback from users has been overwhelmingly positive. Many parents appreciate how the app simplifies the photo editing process, allowing them to focus on enjoying their children rather than getting bogged down by the intricacies of photo management. Comments often highlight the app’s ease of use, quick operation, and the delightful surprise of new artwork generated each day.

#### Why It Matters

In a world where time flies, and childhood moments are fleeting, Precious offers a pragmatic solution for families. It not only makes memory capturing enjoyable but also builds a lasting archive of experiences to savor long after the childhood years have passed. 

So, if you’ve got a little one and you’re looking for a way to preserve those adorable moments without sacrificing your time, give Precious a look. It might just become your favorite parenting tool.
